name: modifyDelay
signature: { <Out>(f: (out: Out, duration: Duration) => DurationInput): <In, R>(self: Schedule<Out, In, R>) => Schedule<Out, In, R>; <Out, In, R>(self: Schedule<Out, In, R>, f: (out: Out, duration: Duration) => DurationInput): Schedule<Out, In, R>; }
description:
Returns a new schedule that modifies the delay between executions using a
custom function.
*Details This function transforms an existing schedule by applying `f` to modify the
delay before each execution. The function receives both the schedule's output
(`out`) and the originally computed delay (`duration`), and returns a new
adjusted delay.
documentation:
